sentence: This law, I see as an effort to take away the years that weve put in trying to make this a better place for kids so they dont have to grow up like I grew up, where I thought I was all alone and then I barely made it through high school.? Floridas teachers, students, and LGBTQ community are continuing to speak out against the bill that was signed by right-wing Trump-supporting governor Ron DeSantis last month.
author: Michael Sainato
title: Hurtful and insulting: Florida teachers react to the dont say gay bill
